356.contents: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. -Nelson Mandela

414.contents: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success. -James Cameron

565.contents: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier. -Mother Teresa

624.contents: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma â€“ which is living with the results of other people's thinking. -Steve Jobs

684.contents: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. -Walt Disney

826.contents: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough. -Oprah Winfrey

843.contents: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor. -Eleanor Roosevelt

996.contents: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans. -John Lennon
